## PreferencePaneManager class

Register preference pane from Zotero 7's `xhtml`<!-- -->, for Zotero 6 &amp; 7.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PreferencePaneManager extends ManagerTool 
```
**Extends:** ManagerTool
